title: Demon Conch
summaries: The Demon Conch is a rare pre-Hardmode item obtainable by fishing in lava. When used, it teleports the player to the center of the Underworld. Like the Magic Mirror, it can be used infinitely at no cost, making it a viable alternative to using conventional hellevators.

statistics.Tooltip:
If you listen closely, you can hear screams
'Watch your toes'
statistics.Sell: 1
